item.title: Blocked drain in the road., 30th March
item.description:
Blocked drain in the road causing water to pool into a 3x3m puddle when raining which goes ontoour driveway. If water rises much more then our garage will flood. Issue has been there since we moved in in January. Particularly bad when significant rainfall or for long periods.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Ledmore Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple pot holes in the road and no street lighting currently which makes it more hazardous when driving, 30th March
item.description:
All over Fairfield Avenue. Please can we have a partial rebate on our council tax as this has been going on for some time. The road is appalling and now dark for the last few weeks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Fairfield Avenue, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path floods, 30th March
item.description:
Outside my house (12 Glynrosa Road) the path floods every time there’s more than a light shower of rain. We live by the junior school so the children either walk through it (only the boys 😂), over our already wet lawn, or in the road. It has happened so many times recently that I feel it needs to be fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Glynrosa Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public footpath sign on corner of Park Lane & Spring Lane has rusted through and is falling over, could possibly fall on somebody., 29th March
item.description:
On corner of Park Lane and Spring Lane. Outside of Skylarks, Park Lane. Signpost pillar has rusted at the bottom and is now falling over, currently leaning on Skyark’s fence and potentially damaging the property and risk of injury to people.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Spring Lane, Prestbury, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
